column4: I am having a bummer of a time trying to fix gnome -- it shows up completely garbled and unusable, and i cant stop it from going straight to it on boot -- i tried xntrl+alt+f1, but it also completely unreadable, how in the hell can i fix this /desperate
Can you boot into recuse mode okay?
okay, you know the 'Press ESC to enter grub menu' bit on bootup?
http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=95 <-- post in there maybe? With details about your system
